ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection Class

Definition

The ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection class is a read/write collection that contains ActiveDirectorySchemaClass objects.

In this Article

public class ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection : System.Collections.CollectionBase
Inheritance

ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection

Properties

Item(Int32)

Gets or sets an ActiveDirectorySchemaClass object in this collection.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass this[int index] { get; set; }
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index of the ActiveDirectorySchemaClass object to get or set.

Value
ActiveDirectorySchemaClass

The ActiveDirectorySchemaClass object that exists at the specified index.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

The member already exists in this collection (applies to set only).

ArgumentNullException

The item specified is null (applies to set only).

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of this collection.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySchemaClass specified has not yet been saved to the Active Directory Domain Services store (applies to set only).
